page.title: 19Industry The P.M.S.Factory
page.content: P.M.S. make plastic items. Per day they make 115,000 pegs, 2,000 knives and 20,000 spade handles. They have a robot from Japan which does most of the work. All the information is stored on computer. There are 11 women and 21 men employed at the factory. The people in the plastic department work shifts. They pack their goods on the premises, ready to be sold mainly abroad. They import their raw materials from Europe. They transport most of their goods by road. The firm is ten years old but has been in their present premises for 7 years with Mr Painter as manager.
